newsitem.title: USA: Innovative Gaming gets Nev. recommendation.
newsitem.headline: Innovative Gaming gets Nev. recommendation.

text.p: Innovative Gaming Corp of America Friday said it received unanimous recommendation from the State of Nevada Gaming Control Board for approval of its Hot Shot Dice game for placement in Nevada casinos.
In a statement, the company said the game will appear on the Nevada Gaming Commission agenda on February 20 for final licensing approval.
The company said it anticipates BJ Blitz and Lightning Strike Roulette games will conclude regulatory field trials soon and anticipates a March Nevada approval for those games.
